Primary Contact: Rod Roberston, ReStore Manager; Phone: 778.755.4346 ext 204
Service Details: - Helps keep material out of landfill by selling new and gently used building materials, appliances, home improvement items and furniture- Proceeds from the sales help support Habitat for Humanity's building program
Hours: Mon-Sat: 9:00am - 5:00pm - Closed Sun and statutory holidays- Donations accepted during store hours
